content: I just got bitten by the fact that normed_space k E is a bad instance, as it extends topological_space E while introducing a new variable k. I would like to work on it, but it only makes sense once #1085 is merged...
No doubt you saw https://leanprover.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/113488-general/topic/more.20type.20class.20inference.20issues/near/167024899 where I was bitten by the same thing.
Yes that's precisely because of this stream that I know that normed_space was going to create problems sooner or later. I hoped later, but it turned out to be sooner.
I hope I will have time for Lean review time tomorrow, and this PR is my top priority.
